name: CL_LGL_NOADD_SING
description: This table stores information about items in the LGL masterfile that are of no-add type and that are single response.

columns.name: LOCATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Locator record.

columns.name: LOCATOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Locator record.

columns.name: CARE_PATH_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The provider-friendly name for a Care Path that is used for distinguishing different Care Paths
